org.ietf.nea.pa.serialize.writer.bytebuffer

Class PaAttributePortFilterValueWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pa.serialize.writer.bytebuffer.PaAttributePortFilterValueWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImWriter<PaAttributeValuePortFilter>, Writer<PaAttributeValuePortFilter,ByteBuffer>

     class PaAttributePortFilterValueWriter
extends Object
implements ImWriter<PaAttributeValuePortFilter>
    Writer to serialize an integrity measurement port filter attribute value compliant to RFC 5792 from a Java object to a buffer of bytes.
